tool.name: Calculate LD values
tool.description: Calculate LD from your own vcf or from the 1000 genomes
tool.command: ./ld_values_1kg.sh #if ($onekg_own_param.onekg_own) == "own_file": -v $onekg_own_param.own_vcf #end if #if ($onekg_use_type_param.onekg_use_type) == 'single': -r $onekg_use_type_param.rsid #end if #if ($onekg_use_type_param.onekg_use_type) == 'file': -s $onekg_use_type_param.snplist #end if -c $region_txt -w $ld_window -r $ld_window_r2 -l $ld_window_kb #if ($comma_list_param.comma_list_select) == "subset": -i $comma_list_param.comma_list #end if #if str($output_format) != "haploview": -o $plink_output #end if -O $plink_log #if str($output_format) == "matrix": -m #end if #if str($output_format) == "haploview": -h $plink_map -p $plink_ped #end if

param.name: onekg_use_type
param.label: Single, All the Snps in the file or Provide a SNP list

param.name: snplist
param.label: Line Seperated List of snp RSIDs for LD calculation
param.help: Leaving this box empty will perform Ld analysis on all the samples

param.name: comma_list_select
param.label: Calculate LD for All Samples or a Subset of Samples

param.name: region_txt
param.label: Chromosome Region
param.help: Chromosome region specified as chr:start-end e.g 4:34234-50000

param.name: ld_window
param.label: LD window size
param.help: Analyse SNPs not more than this number apart

tool.help:
The Tool retrieves LD values from 1000 genomes for a specific chromosome region.
Citations.
The tool uses vcftools, tabix and plink to retrieve data for the user.
